messages.alpha: This is field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: This is field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: This is field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: This is field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: This is field must be between 0:{min} and 1:{max}
messages.confirmed: This is field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: This is field must be numeric and exactly contain 0:{length} digits
messages.dimensions: This is field must be 0:{width} pixels by 1:{height} pixels
messages.email: This is field must be a valid email
messages.not_one_of: This is field is not a valid value
messages.ext: This is field is not a valid file
messages.image: This is field must be an image
messages.integer: This is field must be an integer
messages.length: This is field must be 0:{length} long
messages.max_value: This is field must be 0:{max} or less
messages.max: This is field may not be greater than 0:{length} characters
messages.mimes: This is field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: This is field must be 0:{min} or more
messages.min: This is field must be at least 0:{length} characters
messages.numeric: This is field may only contain numeric characters
messages.one_of: This is field is not a valid value
messages.regex: This is field format is invalid
messages.size: This is field size must be less than 0:{size}KB
messages.url: This is field is not a valid URL

example.login_description: Please enter your details to log in
example.sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
